PSCT.Base: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 1 LIGHT Tuner from your hand. You can target 1 Effect Monster you control; send it to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Blue-Eyes" monster from your hand. You can only use this effect of "Protector with Eyes of Blue" once per turn.
